title: Agent Proposal Schema
description: A standardized template for proposing the creation of a new agent within the Adam system.

proposal_id.description: A unique identifier for the proposal, likely a UUID.

proposal_version.description: The version of the agent proposal schema being used.

generated_by.description: The name of the system component or agent that generated this proposal.

timestamp.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of when the proposal was generated.

gap_report_id.description: The unique identifier of the Capability Gap Report that triggered this proposal.

agent_details.description: Core details of the proposed new agent.

name.description: The proposed name for the new agent.

role.description: A high-level, concise description of the agent's primary function and purpose.

responsibilities.description: A list of specific tasks, functions, and duties the agent will be expected to perform.

required_data_sources.description: A list of data sources the new agent will require access to in order to perform its role.

name.description: A human-readable name for the data source.

description.description: A brief description of the data source and why it is needed.

collaboration_protocols.description: A list defining how this new agent is expected to interact with existing agents.

agent_name.description: The name of the existing agent to collaborate with.

description.description: A description of the data or analysis being exchanged.

estimated_impact.description: A qualitative or quantitative assessment of the expected benefits of creating this agent, such as improved accuracy, increased automation, or new analytical capabilities.

status.description: The current status of the proposal in the review and deployment lifecycle.
